籤詩版本二:
Ngaphandle kwethiyori, akukho sapho.Isidenge samanzi sifana nentyatyambo ewileyo.
Ukuba ucela ububele bakho, kufuneka ukwazi ukuyenza, kodwa ekugqibeleni uya kubona ukuba yonke into isenkingeni.
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokuvaleka kwi-Dao yomntu osisidenge.
Hlala ulondoloza kuyo yonke into kwaye ulinde ixesha.
解曰: Musa ukuthetha okulungileyo nokubi. Kufuneka ulumke. Intliziyo elungileyo. Ukuphepha intlekele.
籤詩故事一:
◇UYin Jiao udibana notitshala wakhe
UYin Jiao wayengunyana kaKumkani uZhou weShang Dynasty, yaye wayenqula uGuang Chengzi njengomfundisi-ntsapho wakhe. Kwiminyaka emithathu kamva, wafunda umlingo, xa wehla entabeni, wafunga eGuangchengzi ukuba akayi kumnceda uKumkani uZhou ukuba enze izinto ezimbi kwaye uya kubalekela kuKumkani uWen.
Endleleni, wakhuthazwa ukuba aye ekhaya ukuze ancede uKumkani uZhou. Inkosi yaya kumcenga, kwaye inkosi kunye nomfundi ofundayo balwa. Kamva, uJiang Ziya noRan Deng ongumTao bavalela uYin Jiao phakathi kweentaba ezimbini baza bahlatywa ngomhlakulo bafa nguGuang Chengzi. Ekuphenduleni isifungo yena (Yin Jiao) wafunga.
聖意: Andakhululekanga ekhaya ndisengozini ndicela imali kunzima ukurhweba kunzima ukutshata ndithandazela iintsikelelo abantu bavimba amasimi maninzi intshulube zesilika zininzi zilwanyana zininzi iintlekele ndikhangela abantu ndisengxakini ndisengxakini ndisengxakini ndisengxakini ndisengxakini ndisengxakini. engxakini.
